sections.heading: dogs; disposal by court order.In addition to any other penalty, a court may order the animal control authority to dispose of a dangerous dog in an expeditious and humane manner

sections.text:
54-621.Dangerous dogs; disposal by court order.

In addition to any other penalty, a court may order the animal control authority to dispose of a dangerous dog in an expeditious and humane manner.

SourceLaws 1989, LB 208, ยง 5.
